products.name: 2750 COTU CLASSIC 901
products.description: Our Classic Superga 2750 Cotu shoe is Fashion's trainer of choice. With an extra strong, fully breathable, pure upper, our timeless shape trainer is a lightweight, simple tennis shoe with our vulcanised sole. In production since 1911, this is the staple shoe with full versatility, and is the very definition of smart casual.

products.name: 2750 PANATTA 3.0 A0P
products.description: A tribute to the Italian tennis champion – these Superga Sport Panatta sneakers fuse a modern aesthetic with the signature elements of the new Panatta, dedicated to the Italian tennis champion. products.name: 2750 KIDS EASYLITE AKF
products.description: A symbol of Italian craftsmanship, a lifestyle icon and a summer must-have reworked into an ultra-lightweight mini-me design. The junior Superga 2750 in Easylite format is characterised by a classic breathable upper, refreshed with lighter foxing around the sole for an even more comfortable fit.
